item.title: Palantir shares drop 12%, falling for a second day as retail traders' latest cult obsession starts to unwind

item.title: DA Davidson recommends speculative IonQ, saying Microsoft breakthrough shows ‘quantum race is accelerating’
item.description: Shares of IonQ could rally 46% from current levels as Microsoft's Majorana 1 validates the entire quantum computing industry, the broker said.

item.title: Goldman is bullish on this Chinese self-driving company as an AI play
item.description: The Wall Street bank sees shares rising about 22% from Wednesday's close.
